assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Inotersen_Renew_Renewal_Parameters_Q2
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Indicate the score of one of the following patient-specific goals of therapy: [Please use the same measure utilized in the submission form]
assessmentQuestionVersion.responseValues: Norfolk Quality of Life (Norfolk QOL-DN) Rasch-Built Overall Disability Scale (R-ODS) Composite Autonomic Symptom Score (COMPASS-31)
